short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create Beautiful Screenshots of any website and put it into real mockup devices photos, browser frames, 3D renders and more!
short.zh_CN:
这是一个chrome 浏览器扩展的模板，使用 Wxt、React、Tailwind css 、 Shadcn ui、Typescript 构建。
支持暗黑模式和本地化

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Take instant, beautiful screenshots from any page you visit.
Place them into real device mockups, add badges, icons and texts to make them POP!
Automatically resize for any social network or app store.
